title: Why is keyboard response time of characters/buttons close to screen edges so bad?
content: When typing on both GBoard and with SwiftKey, buttons close to the edge of the screen, like A and P have a lot slower response time (and makes it difficult to type) than all other keys. Extreme lag all the time. Very frustrating since I keep typing wrong when trying to type fast. And I'm not the only one: https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/jodjzb/is_anyone_elses_pixel_5_keyboard_lagging/
